name: Gpozle
tag_list: posts, notes, search-engine, share, reminders, public-posts, email-notifications
description: Personal search engine for your posts
overview:
Gpozle is a web application for storing and archiving posts. A post can be anything, it can be a small piece of text, html snippet, web page, web page excerpt or images. All posts are taggable, can be shared, searched, converted into reminder, editable, and can be shared for public comments.

Its a kind of post archiving application to store all kind of posts and archive them forever. One can make personal posts for his favorite articles, website links, contacts, addresses,news, reminders, shortcuts, code snippets and any type of short note for quick and frequent access. Anyone can start creating post by just creating a quick account with gpozle. All posts created in user’s account will be saved in his account permanently. The user can only access his personal posts after valid authentication only. Gpozle will index all new post immediately and instantly available to the user by searching a phrase, keyword or substring. All posts created under person’s account can be tagged under different names for proper management and easy accessibility.

Apart from saving, archiving and searching posts, it has features for social sharing, where individual can share posts with everyone, write comments on other’s posts. People can share post among themselves, with their friends, write feedbacks and comments, store others posts privately and lot many features.

Gpozle has inbuilt feature of reminders, where posts can be converted into reminders. Posts like bdays, anniversaries and meetings can be converted into reminders for which user will get time to time notifications via email and desktop notifications.

All these features are very simple to use and self explanatory. A person who wants to join gpozle can simply enter his email and password of his choice and can start posting. Similarly all other features are one click features where each feature is self explanatory itself.

This can be very useful for those who wants to store each and every piece of information and access anytime anywhere, who wants to write publicly articles, blogs and get comments on them, who is willing to advertise some of his old or new products etc.

Apart from all these features, so many new features are under development like REST APIs, widgets for mobile devices, which will be launched soon in future.
